# Trove by CodeXtreme - LLMs.txt
# A curated guide for AI assistants to understand and navigate this site

## Site Summary
Trove is the central workflow platform for CodeXtreme, a community of builders and hackers.
The platform hosts hackathons, buildathons, learning challenges, and connects builders with opportunities.

## Primary Purpose
- Host and manage hackathon events (registration, team formation, submissions, judging, leaderboards)
- Connect builders with teammates and opportunities
- Track achievements and learning progress
- Foster a global community of tech builders

## Key Pages

### Homepage (/)
Overview of CodeXtreme and Trove. Entry point for discovering events and features.

### Hackathons (/hackathons)
Browse upcoming and past hackathon events. Filter by status, type, or search.
- Event details: /hackathons/{slug}
- Registration: /hackathons/{slug}/register

### Leaderboard (/leaderboard)
Real-time rankings for hackathon participants. Filter by track or event.

### Team Features
- Team dashboard: /hackathons/{slug}/team
- Create team: /hackathons/{slug}/team/create
- Join via invite: /join/{code}

### Submissions
- Project submission form: /hackathons/{slug}/submission

### Judging (for judges)
- Judging queue: /judging/{eventSlug}
- Compare mode: /judging/{eventSlug}/compare

## Coming Soon Modules
These are beautiful preview pages with waitlist signup:
- Townsquare (/townsquare) - Global community feed
- Buildathon (/buildathon) - Long-form building challenges
- Power of Code (/power-of-code) - Skill challenges and learning
- Opportunities (/opportunities) - Job board for builders

## Technical Stack
- Frontend: React + TypeScript + TailwindCSS
- Routing: TanStack Router
- Backend: Convex (real-time database)
- Styling: Custom design system with Framer Motion animations
- PWA: Installable with offline support
